author: Angela Dewan, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Friday, April 17
description: The social distancing deniers have arrived. Protesters gathered in several US state capitals this week to voice their opposition to stay-at-home orders that were issued to slow the coronavirus' spread.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the April 17 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
